item.title: Elon Musk appears to be driving Europe away from Teslas
item.description: Overall EV sales in Europe surged 34% in January, while Tesla saw its sales across the continent plummet by a staggering 45%.

item.title: Trump to hold first Cabinet meeting, with Musk in attendance
item.description: President Trump is holding his first Cabinet meeting at the White House on Wednesday, with his Cabinet nominees largely confirmed.
